headlines.description: Premier League strugglers Huddersfield Town picked up a valuable away point with a 1-1 draw at Burnley on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Schindler gives Huddersfield point at Burnley

headlines.description: Matt Doherty scored the winner as Wolverhampton Wanderers won 1-0 at rainswept Crystal Palace on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Wolves go six games unbeaten with Palace win

headlines.description: Gylfi Sigurdsson struck a glorious 77th-minute winner to earn Everton a 2-1 win at 10-man Leicester City in the Premier League on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Everton's Sigurdsson scores dazzling goal in win

headlines.description: Cardiff City's Premier League woes continued as they had a man sent off in a 1-0 defeat by Tottenham Hotspur at Wembley Stadium on Saturday.
Josh King struck twice as Bournemouth continued their best start to a Premier League season with a 4-0 thumping of 10-man Watford.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bournemouth earn biggest top-flight away win at Watford

headlines.description: A 90th-minute goal by Alexis Sanchez helped Manchester United complete an unlikely comeback and claim a 3-2 win over Newcastle at Old Trafford.
headlines.shortLinkText: Sanchez the hero as Utd come back vs. Newcastle
